text: [Music]
hi I'm Ashish a cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Bangalore
today I'm going to show you how you can
configure an Amazon ec2 Windows instance
to allow the downloads using Microsoft
Internet Explorer so let's get started
to increase the security posture of
Windows servers launched on Amazon ec2
the Internet Explorer enhanced security
configuration is enabled by default on
all Windows Server Amis provided by
Amazon this configuration also disables
file downloads using Internet Explorer
so let's see how we can disable enhanced
security to allow file downloads open
the AWS Management console and then
navigate to the Amazon ec2 console
go to instances
choose any running EC to Windows
instance and then use RDP to connect to
it
after you log in open Internet Explorer
visit any website and try downloading a
file or a software application
for example let's say I want to download
Google Chrome for my instance I'll go to
google.com forward slash Chrome
so when we do this we get this error
message saying contained from the
website listed below is being blocked by
the Internet Explorer enhanced security
configuration
to avoid this warning we must disable
I.E in and security for that we must
open server manager
choose local server from the navigation
pane
by default IE enhanced security
configuration is turned on choose on to
display the pop-up window
in the pop-up window for administrators
select off and then choose ok
now close server manager
now reopen Internet Explorer and again
try downloading Google Chrome from
google.com forward slash Chrome
this time we don't receive the same
warning and the download was also
successful
please note that you re-enable the
enhanced security configuration after
you download your file this helps
keeping your instance secure
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
